name: Donut Man Saga: Begins
description:
In this game you play as DONUT MAN, the mightiest hero in all the lands.

The premise of the game is simple, Aliens have come to invade earth, they are in a stalemate with armies of the earth, everyone took to the skies to fight.

Only you DONUT MAN can change the tides of battle

chose which side you're on.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move around

Right click to shoot and kill

Left click to shoot donuts and heal

Who you kill and who you heal will determine the outcome of the battle.

NB: Don't take this too seriously, it's a game for a game jam, my first ever (excuses) and I was just trying to have fun.

use firefox :p 

there is a problem with resolution :(
